𒇻𒁍𒌓𒉣𒄷 udu-bu-adab mušen “a bird”

𓄿 eagle < 𓅀 αἰγυπιός aigupiós < γύψ gúps 𓅐

aegithalos αἰγίθηλος a little song bird

Bulis Βοῦλ-ις long-beaked bird that pecks out the eyes of fish. => pounx (πώυγξ) phoenix

to fear тæрсын (tærsyn ) tearse dread
